question:
Eventually, technology will solve the most important environmental problems the world faces today.  
To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: Team sports make children become more adequate member of the society. This assists them to develop a sense of belonging and sense of respect towards both team mates  and opponents. Children have  greater enjoyment, when they participate in an activity with peer groups rather than playing themselves. When they actively involve sporting activities, this allows them to interact with others, this often helps them to overcome their shyness.

However, others think that this may not be suitable for the  children who  either disabled or having serious medical conditions, if they are forced to fit into a  group, it creates a lot of emotional conflicts. Similarly,  it is often believed that independent games are suitable because this teaches how to  encounter challenges alone and independent spirited Apart from this, team sports often follow stricter training schedules, which creates several difficulties to both children and parents, children may not get enough time for his family.

There are some people believe  that parents should take the  responsibility . This is because parents are the influential figure  for children; therefore , they can set an example by participating   in various  physically  active  challenges, including, exercise and sports.  For which, parents should  instil interest in children, by engaging them in either sports or exercise. Especially, these days,   many children are suffering from the problems of obesity, so being  a parent, ensure that children, who  involves in physical activities to keep their body healthy
